title: RIOT you forgot something...
body:
You forgot to change Thresh's title.. He cant be 'The chain Warden' anymore because he is no longer a Warden...
So lets fix this! orrrrrr we can give him his old prison warden theme back and pretend this little mishap never happened ^^

Plus his intro song doesn't work anymore now they he isn't a warden... :(

replies.body: When did he stop being a Warden?
in his new lore, he looks after old magic items in a basement and spends his time scratching mirrors.
